ceremony-details: Please arrive 30 minutes early to be seated. The ceremony will be outdoors — light attire recommended!
reception-details: Dinner, drinks, and dancing to follow. Valet parking will be available on-site.
itinerary-subheader: Here’s a look at the special moments planned for our big day.
welcome-itinerary-description: Join us for an intimate ceremony surrounded by nature and love.
ceremony-itinerary-description: Enjoy drinks and hors d’oeuvres while we take wedding photos.
cocktails-itinerary-description: Let’s celebrate with dinner, speeches, and dancing!
reception-itinerary-description: Help us close the night with a sparkler sendoff!
rsvp-subheader: We’d love to know if you can join us in celebrating our wedding day. Please RSVP by January 20, 2026 so we can plan accordingly.
solo-rsvp-message: Please let us know if you’ll be joining us.
group-rsvp-message: Please let us know who from your group will be joining us.
contact-info-message: Please share your contact info — we might have a little something to send your way
rsvp-success-message: Thank you for letting us know — we can’t wait to celebrate with you!
rsvp-already-submitted-message: It looks like you’ve already submitted your RSVP. If you need to make changes, please contact us directly.
additional-details-subheader: Here’s everything you might want to know to help plan your time with us.
thank-you-message: Thank you for celebrating with us! After the wedding, please return to this website to see all the photos and relive the memories from our special day.
